entry.data:
CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SNOW LATE THIS EVENING, THEN SNOW LIKELY AFTER MIDNIGHT
SNOW ACCUMULATION AROUND AN INCH
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 15
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 60 PERCENT

SNOW
NEW SNOW ACCUMULATION AROUND AN INCH
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 20S
NORTHEAST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW 90 PERCENT

SNOW IN THE EVENING, THEN SNOW SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
SNOW MAY BE HEAVY AT TIMES IN THE EVENING
STORM TOTAL SNOW ACCUMULATION OF 4 TO 8 INCHES
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
NORTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH
CHANCE OF SNOW NEAR 100 PERCENT
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 1 BELOW AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 20
NORTH WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 1 ABOVE
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 6 BELOW AFTER MIDNIGHT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS 15 TO 20
WIND CHILL READINGS AS LOW AS 5 BELOW IN THE MORNING

MOSTLY CLEAR
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND ZERO

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 20S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS 10 TO 15
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
